parameters.name: AutoRecover
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically clear alert events. Valid values:

*   true (default)
*   false

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the alert integration.

parameters.name: DuplicateKey
parameters.description: The fields whose values are deduplicated.

parameters.name: ExtendedFieldRedefineRules
parameters.description: The extended mapped fields are mapped to the fields of ARMS alerts. For more information, see the description of the ExtendedFieldRedefineRules parameter.

parameters.name: FieldRedefineRules
parameters.description: The predefined mapped fields are mapped to the fields of ARMS alerts. The predefined mapped fields were generated when the alert integration was created. For more information, see the description of the FieldRedefineRules parameter.

parameters.name: InitiativeRecoverField
parameters.description:
The field for clearing alert events. The system queries alert events based on the field of alert clearing events and clears the alert events.

> Only the Log Service alert integration supports the parameter.

parameters.name: InitiativeRecoverValue
parameters.description:
The value of the field for clearing alert events. The system queries alert events based on the field of alert clearing events and clears the alert events.

> Only the Log Service alert integration supports the parameter.

parameters.name: IntegrationId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert integration.

parameters.name: IntegrationName
parameters.description: The name of the alert integration.

parameters.name: IntegrationProductType
parameters.description:
The service of the alert integration. Valid values:

*   CLOUD_MONITOR: CloudMonitor
*   LOG_SERVICE: Log Service

parameters.name: Liveness
parameters.description: The activity of the alert integration

parameters.name: RecoverTime
parameters.description: The period of time within which alert events are automatically cleared. Unit: seconds. Default value: 300.

parameters.name: Stat
parameters.description: The total number of alert events and the number of abnormal alert events in the last hour.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the alert integration was enabled. Valid values:

*   true
*   false
